data.title: Scott Storch production discography
data.text:
The following list is the production discography of American music producer Scott Storch. It includes songs produced, co-produced and remixed by year, artist, album and title.

Contents: Singles produced – '93 – '94 – '95 – '96 – '97 – '98 – '99 – '00 – '01 – '02 – '03 – '04 – '05 – '06 – '07 – '08 – '09 – '10 – '11 – '12 – '13 – '14 – '15 – '16 – '17 – '19 – '20 -Production credits – Other contributions – References
